title: Propulsion Assignment
description: The objective of this assignment is to apply the principles and concepts learned in the course to design, analyze, and optimize a rocket propulsion system. You will demonstrate your understanding of rocket propulsion fundamentals, fuel and combustion processes, and nozzle design by completing a series of tasks that involve theoretical calculations, design considerations, and performance analysis.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze the combustion process in rocket engines, including the chemical reactions involved, the factors affecting combustion efficiency, and methods to mitigate instability.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle for a specified engine, including detailed calculations for the nozzle's geometry, performance analysis at different altitudes, and optimization for specific applications.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz covering the basic aerodynamic concepts, including lift, drag, and the principles of fluid dynamics as they apply to aerodynamics.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform an analysis of subsonic and supersonic flow around various aerodynamic shapes, including calculations of pressure distribution and flow characteristics.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze the aerodynamic heating on a re-entry vehicle, including calculations of heat transfer rates, material selection for thermal protection, and methods to manage thermal stresses.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structure, considering the selection of materials, load-bearing requirements, and the overall structural integrity for space missions.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters and design orbital maneuvers for a specified mission, including the use of Kepler's laws and Hohmann transfer orbits.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: An exam covering the principles of systems engineering, including the integration of subsystems, reliability analysis, and project management in aerospace applications.
